name: Gosper Glider Gun
description: The first discovered gun pattern that creates gliders periodically. Produces a new glider every 30 generations, proving that patterns can grow indefinitely.
author: Bill Gosper

metadata.significance: First gun pattern discovered, proved infinite growth possible
metadata.prize: Won $50 prize from John Conway for disproving his conjecture

simulation.notes: Watch for gliders being emitted every 30 generations. Best viewed with a large grid to see gliders travel.
